name: Delicious Bread
author: CHRIS LANGE
summary: This bread is wonderful when served with spaghetti or lasagna. It's also easy for kids to prepare.
ingredients: ½ cup butter, melted and cooled
1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
directions: In a bowl, combine cooled butter, egg, garlic salt and dried parsley
Pull off walnut size pieces of dough
Dip the bread pieces in the butter mixture and place in a lightly greased Bundt cake pan
When all of the bread dough has been placed in the pan, pour the remaining butter mixture over the top of the dough
Cover pan and put in a warm place until bread pieces have doubled in size
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 45 minutes, until browned
